Heidi and I are heartbroken to learn of the passing of Comal County Judge Sherman Krause. Judge Krause provided steady leadership for over 15 years and was a great friend to many.

London Smith courageously led her campers to safety during last summer's devastating flood at Camp Mystic. 

It was an honor meeting her yesterday and hearing her story. 

I am incredibly proud of her resilience and bravery. The Lone Star State is blessed with young leaders like https://t.co/UZok2smymo

I will keep fighting to unleash this new technology in a way that makes drivers and pedestrians safer. https://t.co/TEtkC1fnPW

I am a passionate supporter of the SAVE Act. 

We ought to nuke the zombie filibuster and require a talking filibuster if Democrats want to try to block it. 

Let’s force a vote and get it passed. https://t.co/CaUQbiSyg7
